entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 12:58 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -27.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
